name: Destined: Lost Fate - DEMO (EtherChimera)
description:
The journey begins...

Waking in the capital city of Gallott, Maria goes about her recently adopted royal status to find comfort in the man who gave her this privileged lifestyle, only to be confronted by the terrors of the outside world - the Zeiph - creatures that appeared not so long ago and ended a conflict between two of the three dynasties in the kingdom. Maria and her new royal family agree after years of tension and a recent turn of events that it's time to fight back!

Don't forget to check out the website for more details and updates!
